Intro - about me, career objectives

My name is Melissa Keizer and I am a hardworking, motivated designer with a huge enthusiasm for designing for the web and mobile. I’ve had 2.5 years experience working in the industry thus far, and I’m eagar to make the step up to an environment that offers more variety, new challenges and opportunities to better my skillset and expand my knowledge.

Experience

Designer & Front-end Developer

at Rumble Labs July 2013 - Present

My primary role at Rumble Labs involves designing and developing user interfaces for both web and mobile sites and applications. My focus is on creating high quality visuals with a user-centered approach to design.

I strive to create clean, sematic code with a DRY (don’t repeat yourself) approach. I regularly work within various development environments, including Ruby and Rails, PHP, Wordpress and static-site generators Jekyll and Middleman.

My secondary roles include all internal and client photography, event organisation (monthly Belfast Ruby meetups etc), social media strategy and management.

Junior Designer

at Creative Online Media May 2011 - September 2012

I became equipped with a diverse range of hard and soft skills after my first full-time job in the web industry, working with COM during my placement year.

My primary role was in the design and development of websites for a range of clients, with a focus on semantic markup, SEO and high quality visuals that meet the needs of the client.
